yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū awfū bil-ʿuqūdi uḥillat lakum bahīmatu al-anʿāmi illā mā yut'lā ʿalaykum ghayra muḥillī al-ṣaydi wa-antum ḥurumun inna al-laha yaḥkumu mā yurīdu

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tuḥillū shaʿāira al-lahi walā al-shahra al-ḥarāma walā al-hadya walā al-qalāida walā āmmīna al-bayta al-ḥarāma yabtaghūna faḍlan min rabbihim wariḍ'wānan wa-idhā ḥalaltum fa-iṣ'ṭādū walā yajrimannakum shanaānu qawmin an ṣaddūkum ʿani al-masjidi al-ḥarāmi an taʿtadū wataʿāwanū ʿalā al-biri wal-taqwā walā taʿāwanū ʿalā al-ith'mi wal-ʿud'wāni wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi

ḥurrimat ʿalaykumu al-maytatu wal-damu walaḥmu al-khinzīri wamā uhilla lighayri al-lahi bihi wal-mun'khaniqatu wal-mawqūdhatu wal-mutaradiyatu wal-naṭīḥatu wamā akala al-sabuʿu illā mā dhakkaytum wamā dhubiḥa ʿalā al-nuṣubi wa-an tastaqsimū bil-azlāmi dhālikum fis'qun al-yawma ya-isa alladhīna kafarū min dīnikum falā takhshawhum wa-ikh'shawni al-yawma akmaltu lakum dīnakum wa-atmamtu ʿalaykum niʿ'matī waraḍītu lakumu al-is'lāma dīnan famani uḍ'ṭurra fī makhmaṣatin ghayra mutajānifin li-ith'min fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun

yasalūnaka mādhā uḥilla lahum qul uḥilla lakumu al-ṭayibātu wamā ʿallamtum mina al-jawāriḥi mukallibīna tuʿallimūnahunna mimmā ʿallamakumu al-lahu fakulū mimmā amsakna ʿalaykum wa-udh'kurū is'ma al-lahi ʿalayhi wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi

al-yawma uḥilla lakumu al-ṭayibātu waṭaʿāmu alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba ḥillun lakum waṭaʿāmukum ḥillun lahum wal-muḥ'ṣanātu mina al-mu'mināti wal-muḥ'ṣanātu mina alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba min qablikum idhā ātaytumūhunna ujūrahunna muḥ'ṣinīna ghayra musāfiḥīna walā muttakhidhī akhdānin waman yakfur bil-īmāni faqad ḥabiṭa ʿamaluhu wahuwa fī al-ākhirati mina al-khāsirīna

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā qum'tum ilā al-ṣalati fa-igh'silū wujūhakum wa-aydiyakum ilā al-marāfiqi wa-im'saḥū biruūsikum wa-arjulakum ilā al-kaʿbayni wa-in kuntum junuban fa-iṭṭahharū wa-in kuntum marḍā aw ʿalā safarin aw jāa aḥadun minkum mina al-ghāiṭi aw lāmastumu al-nisāa falam tajidū māan fatayammamū ṣaʿīdan ṭayyiban fa-im'saḥū biwujūhikum wa-aydīkum min'hu mā yurīdu al-lahu liyajʿala ʿalaykum min ḥarajin walākin yurīdu liyuṭahhirakum waliyutimma niʿ'matahu ʿalaykum laʿallakum tashkurūna
wa-udh'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi ʿalaykum wamīthāqahu alladhī wāthaqakum bihi idh qul'tum samiʿ'nā wa-aṭaʿnā wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū kūnū qawwāmīna lillahi shuhadāa bil-qis'ṭi walā yajrimannakum shanaānu qawmin ʿalā allā taʿdilū iʿ'dilū huwa aqrabu lilttaqwā wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
waʿada al-lahu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun ʿaẓīmun
wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū udh'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi ʿalaykum idh hamma qawmun an yabsuṭū ilaykum aydiyahum fakaffa aydiyahum ʿankum wa-ittaqū al-laha waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna

walaqad akhadha al-lahu mīthāqa banī is'rāīla wabaʿathnā min'humu ith'nay ʿashara naqīban waqāla al-lahu innī maʿakum la-in aqamtumu al-ṣalata waātaytumu al-zakata waāmantum birusulī waʿazzartumūhum wa-aqraḍtumu al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan la-ukaffiranna ʿankum sayyiātikum wala-ud'khilannakum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru faman kafara baʿda dhālika minkum faqad ḍalla sawāa al-sabīli

fabimā naqḍihim mīthāqahum laʿannāhum wajaʿalnā qulūbahum qāsiyatan yuḥarrifūna al-kalima ʿan mawāḍiʿihi wanasū ḥaẓẓan mimmā dhukkirū bihi walā tazālu taṭṭaliʿu ʿalā khāinatin min'hum illā qalīlan min'hum fa-uʿ'fu ʿanhum wa-iṣ'faḥ inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna

wamina alladhīna qālū innā naṣārā akhadhnā mīthāqahum fanasū ḥaẓẓan mimmā dhukkirū bihi fa-aghraynā baynahumu al-ʿadāwata wal-baghḍāa ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati wasawfa yunabbi-uhumu al-lahu bimā kānū yaṣnaʿūna
yāahla al-kitābi qad jāakum rasūlunā yubayyinu lakum kathīran mimmā kuntum tukh'fūna mina al-kitābi wayaʿfū ʿan kathīrin qad jāakum mina al-lahi nūrun wakitābun mubīnun
yahdī bihi al-lahu mani ittabaʿa riḍ'wānahu subula al-salāmi wayukh'rijuhum mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri bi-idh'nihi wayahdīhim ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin

laqad kafara alladhīna qālū inna al-laha huwa al-masīḥu ub'nu maryama qul faman yamliku mina al-lahi shayan in arāda an yuh'lika al-masīḥa ib'na maryama wa-ummahu waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā yakhluqu mā yashāu wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun

waqālati al-yahūdu wal-naṣārā naḥnu abnāu al-lahi wa-aḥibbāuhu qul falima yuʿadhibukum bidhunūbikum bal antum basharun mimman khalaqa yaghfiru liman yashāu wayuʿadhibu man yashāu walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā wa-ilayhi al-maṣīru
yāahla al-kitābi qad jāakum rasūlunā yubayyinu lakum ʿalā fatratin mina al-rusuli an taqūlū mā jāanā min bashīrin walā nadhīrin faqad jāakum bashīrun wanadhīrun wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
wa-idh qāla mūsā liqawmihi yāqawmi udh'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi ʿalaykum idh jaʿala fīkum anbiyāa wajaʿalakum mulūkan waātākum mā lam yu'ti aḥadan mina al-ʿālamīna
yāqawmi ud'khulū al-arḍa al-muqadasata allatī kataba al-lahu lakum walā tartaddū ʿalā adbārikum fatanqalibū khāsirīna
qālū yāmūsā inna fīhā qawman jabbārīna wa-innā lan nadkhulahā ḥattā yakhrujū min'hā fa-in yakhrujū min'hā fa-innā dākhilūna
qāla rajulāni mina alladhīna yakhāfūna anʿama al-lahu ʿalayhimā ud'khulū ʿalayhimu al-bāba fa-idhā dakhaltumūhu fa-innakum ghālibūna waʿalā al-lahi fatawakkalū in kuntum mu'minīna
qālū yāmūsā innā lan nadkhulahā abadan mā dāmū fīhā fa-idh'hab anta warabbuka faqātilā innā hāhunā qāʿidūna
qāla rabbi innī lā amliku illā nafsī wa-akhī fa-uf'ruq baynanā wabayna al-qawmi al-fāsiqīna
qāla fa-innahā muḥarramatun ʿalayhim arbaʿīna sanatan yatīhūna fī al-arḍi falā tasa ʿalā al-qawmi al-fāsiqīna
wa-ut'lu ʿalayhim naba-a ib'nay ādama bil-ḥaqi idh qarrabā qur'bānan fatuqubbila min aḥadihimā walam yutaqabbal mina al-ākhari qāla la-aqtulannaka qāla innamā yataqabbalu al-lahu mina al-mutaqīna
la-in basaṭta ilayya yadaka litaqtulanī mā anā bibāsiṭin yadiya ilayka li-aqtulaka innī akhāfu al-laha rabba al-ʿālamīna
innī urīdu an tabūa bi-ith'mī wa-ith'mika fatakūna min aṣḥābi al-nāri wadhālika jazāu al-ẓālimīna
faṭawwaʿat lahu nafsuhu qatla akhīhi faqatalahu fa-aṣbaḥa mina al-khāsirīna
fabaʿatha al-lahu ghurāban yabḥathu fī al-arḍi liyuriyahu kayfa yuwārī sawata akhīhi qāla yāwaylatā aʿajaztu an akūna mith'la hādhā al-ghurābi fa-uwāriya sawata akhī fa-aṣbaḥa mina al-nādimīna

min ajli dhālika katabnā ʿalā banī is'rāīla annahu man qatala nafsan bighayri nafsin aw fasādin fī al-arḍi faka-annamā qatala al-nāsa jamīʿan waman aḥyāhā faka-annamā aḥyā al-nāsa jamīʿan walaqad jāathum rusulunā bil-bayināti thumma inna kathīran min'hum baʿda dhālika fī al-arḍi lamus'rifūna

innamā jazāu alladhīna yuḥāribūna al-laha warasūlahu wayasʿawna fī al-arḍi fasādan an yuqattalū aw yuṣallabū aw tuqaṭṭaʿa aydīhim wa-arjuluhum min khilāfin aw yunfaw mina al-arḍi dhālika lahum khiz'yun fī al-dun'yā walahum fī al-ākhirati ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
illā alladhīna tābū min qabli an taqdirū ʿalayhim fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wa-ib'taghū ilayhi al-wasīlata wajāhidū fī sabīlihi laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
inna alladhīna kafarū law anna lahum mā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan wamith'lahu maʿahu liyaftadū bihi min ʿadhābi yawmi al-qiyāmati mā tuqubbila min'hum walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
yurīdūna an yakhrujū mina al-nāri wamā hum bikhārijīna min'hā walahum ʿadhābun muqīmun
wal-sāriqu wal-sāriqatu fa-iq'ṭaʿū aydiyahumā jazāan bimā kasabā nakālan mina al-lahi wal-lahu ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
faman tāba min baʿdi ẓul'mihi wa-aṣlaḥa fa-inna al-laha yatūbu ʿalayhi inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
alam taʿlam anna al-laha lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yuʿadhibu man yashāu wayaghfiru liman yashāu wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun

yāayyuhā al-rasūlu lā yaḥzunka alladhīna yusāriʿūna fī al-kuf'ri mina alladhīna qālū āmannā bi-afwāhihim walam tu'min qulūbuhum wamina alladhīna hādū sammāʿūna lil'kadhibi sammāʿūna liqawmin ākharīna lam yatūka yuḥarrifūna al-kalima min baʿdi mawāḍiʿihi yaqūlūna in ūtītum hādhā fakhudhūhu wa-in lam tu'tawhu fa-iḥ'dharū waman yuridi al-lahu fit'natahu falan tamlika lahu mina al-lahi shayan ulāika alladhīna lam yuridi al-lahu an yuṭahhira qulūbahum lahum fī al-dun'yā khiz'yun walahum fī al-ākhirati ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun

sammāʿūna lil'kadhibi akkālūna lilssuḥ'ti fa-in jāūka fa-uḥ'kum baynahum aw aʿriḍ ʿanhum wa-in tuʿ'riḍ ʿanhum falan yaḍurrūka shayan wa-in ḥakamta fa-uḥ'kum baynahum bil-qis'ṭi inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-muq'siṭīna
wakayfa yuḥakkimūnaka waʿindahumu al-tawrātu fīhā ḥuk'mu al-lahi thumma yatawallawna min baʿdi dhālika wamā ulāika bil-mu'minīna

innā anzalnā al-tawrāta fīhā hudan wanūrun yaḥkumu bihā al-nabiyūna alladhīna aslamū lilladhīna hādū wal-rabāniyūna wal-aḥbāru bimā us'tuḥ'fiẓū min kitābi al-lahi wakānū ʿalayhi shuhadāa falā takhshawū al-nāsa wa-ikh'shawni walā tashtarū biāyātī thamanan qalīlan waman lam yaḥkum bimā anzala al-lahu fa-ulāika humu al-kāfirūna

wakatabnā ʿalayhim fīhā anna al-nafsa bil-nafsi wal-ʿayna bil-ʿayni wal-anfa bil-anfi wal-udhuna bil-udhuni wal-sina bil-sini wal-jurūḥa qiṣāṣun faman taṣaddaqa bihi fahuwa kaffāratun lahu waman lam yaḥkum bimā anzala al-lahu fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna

waqaffaynā ʿalā āthārihim biʿīsā ib'ni maryama muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi mina al-tawrāti waātaynāhu al-injīla fīhi hudan wanūrun wamuṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi mina al-tawrāti wahudan wamawʿiẓatan lil'muttaqīna
walyaḥkum ahlu al-injīli bimā anzala al-lahu fīhi waman lam yaḥkum bimā anzala al-lahu fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna

wa-anzalnā ilayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi mina al-kitābi wamuhayminan ʿalayhi fa-uḥ'kum baynahum bimā anzala al-lahu walā tattabiʿ ahwāahum ʿammā jāaka mina al-ḥaqi likullin jaʿalnā minkum shir'ʿatan wamin'hājan walaw shāa al-lahu lajaʿalakum ummatan wāḥidatan walākin liyabluwakum fī mā ātākum fa-is'tabiqū al-khayrāti ilā al-lahi marjiʿukum jamīʿan fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna

wa-ani uḥ'kum baynahum bimā anzala al-lahu walā tattabiʿ ahwāahum wa-iḥ'dharhum an yaftinūka ʿan baʿḍi mā anzala al-lahu ilayka fa-in tawallaw fa-iʿ'lam annamā yurīdu al-lahu an yuṣībahum bibaʿḍi dhunūbihim wa-inna kathīran mina al-nāsi lafāsiqūna
afaḥuk'ma al-jāhiliyati yabghūna waman aḥsanu mina al-lahi ḥuk'man liqawmin yūqinūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tattakhidhū al-yahūda wal-naṣārā awliyāa baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin waman yatawallahum minkum fa-innahu min'hum inna al-laha lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
fatarā alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun yusāriʿūna fīhim yaqūlūna nakhshā an tuṣībanā dāiratun faʿasā al-lahu an yatiya bil-fatḥi aw amrin min ʿindihi fayuṣ'biḥū ʿalā mā asarrū fī anfusihim nādimīna
wayaqūlu alladhīna āmanū ahāulāi alladhīna aqsamū bil-lahi jahda aymānihim innahum lamaʿakum ḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum fa-aṣbaḥū khāsirīna

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū man yartadda minkum ʿan dīnihi fasawfa yatī al-lahu biqawmin yuḥibbuhum wayuḥibbūnahu adhillatin ʿalā al-mu'minīna aʿizzatin ʿalā al-kāfirīna yujāhidūna fī sabīli al-lahi walā yakhāfūna lawmata lāimin dhālika faḍlu al-lahi yu'tīhi man yashāu wal-lahu wāsiʿun ʿalīmun
innamā waliyyukumu al-lahu warasūluhu wa-alladhīna āmanū alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum rākiʿūna
waman yatawalla al-laha warasūlahu wa-alladhīna āmanū fa-inna ḥiz'ba al-lahi humu al-ghālibūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tattakhidhū alladhīna ittakhadhū dīnakum huzuwan walaʿiban mina alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba min qablikum wal-kufāra awliyāa wa-ittaqū al-laha in kuntum mu'minīna
wa-idhā nādaytum ilā al-ṣalati ittakhadhūhā huzuwan walaʿiban dhālika bi-annahum qawmun lā yaʿqilūna
qul yāahla al-kitābi hal tanqimūna minnā illā an āmannā bil-lahi wamā unzila ilaynā wamā unzila min qablu wa-anna aktharakum fāsiqūna

qul hal unabbi-ukum bisharrin min dhālika mathūbatan ʿinda al-lahi man laʿanahu al-lahu waghaḍiba ʿalayhi wajaʿala min'humu al-qiradata wal-khanāzīra waʿabada al-ṭāghūta ulāika sharrun makānan wa-aḍallu ʿan sawāi al-sabīli
wa-idhā jāūkum qālū āmannā waqad dakhalū bil-kuf'ri wahum qad kharajū bihi wal-lahu aʿlamu bimā kānū yaktumūna
watarā kathīran min'hum yusāriʿūna fī al-ith'mi wal-ʿud'wāni wa-aklihimu al-suḥ'ta labi'sa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
lawlā yanhāhumu al-rabāniyūna wal-aḥbāru ʿan qawlihimu al-ith'ma wa-aklihimu al-suḥ'ta labi'sa mā kānū yaṣnaʿūna

waqālati al-yahūdu yadu al-lahi maghlūlatun ghullat aydīhim waluʿinū bimā qālū bal yadāhu mabsūṭatāni yunfiqu kayfa yashāu walayazīdanna kathīran min'hum mā unzila ilayka min rabbika ṭugh'yānan wakuf'ran wa-alqaynā baynahumu al-ʿadāwata wal-baghḍāa ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati kullamā awqadū nāran lil'ḥarbi aṭfa-ahā al-lahu wayasʿawna fī al-arḍi fasādan wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu al-muf'sidīna
walaw anna ahla al-kitābi āmanū wa-ittaqaw lakaffarnā ʿanhum sayyiātihim wala-adkhalnāhum jannāti al-naʿīmi
walaw annahum aqāmū al-tawrāta wal-injīla wamā unzila ilayhim min rabbihim la-akalū min fawqihim wamin taḥti arjulihim min'hum ummatun muq'taṣidatun wakathīrun min'hum sāa mā yaʿmalūna
yāayyuhā al-rasūlu balligh mā unzila ilayka min rabbika wa-in lam tafʿal famā ballaghta risālatahu wal-lahu yaʿṣimuka mina al-nāsi inna al-laha lā yahdī al-qawma al-kāfirīna

qul yāahla al-kitābi lastum ʿalā shayin ḥattā tuqīmū al-tawrāta wal-injīla wamā unzila ilaykum min rabbikum walayazīdanna kathīran min'hum mā unzila ilayka min rabbika ṭugh'yānan wakuf'ran falā tasa ʿalā al-qawmi al-kāfirīna
inna alladhīna āmanū wa-alladhīna hādū wal-ṣābiūna wal-naṣārā man āmana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri waʿamila ṣāliḥan falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
laqad akhadhnā mīthāqa banī is'rāīla wa-arsalnā ilayhim rusulan kullamā jāahum rasūlun bimā lā tahwā anfusuhum farīqan kadhabū wafarīqan yaqtulūna
waḥasibū allā takūna fit'natun faʿamū waṣammū thumma tāba al-lahu ʿalayhim thumma ʿamū waṣammū kathīrun min'hum wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā yaʿmalūna

laqad kafara alladhīna qālū inna al-laha huwa al-masīḥu ub'nu maryama waqāla al-masīḥu yābanī is'rāīla uʿ'budū al-laha rabbī warabbakum innahu man yush'rik bil-lahi faqad ḥarrama al-lahu ʿalayhi al-janata wamawāhu al-nāru wamā lilẓẓālimīna min anṣārin
laqad kafara alladhīna qālū inna al-laha thālithu thalāthatin wamā min ilāhin illā ilāhun wāḥidun wa-in lam yantahū ʿammā yaqūlūna layamassanna alladhīna kafarū min'hum ʿadhābun alīmun
afalā yatūbūna ilā al-lahi wayastaghfirūnahu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
mā al-masīḥu ub'nu maryama illā rasūlun qad khalat min qablihi al-rusulu wa-ummuhu ṣiddīqatun kānā yakulāni al-ṭaʿāma unẓur kayfa nubayyinu lahumu al-āyāti thumma unẓur annā yu'fakūna
qul ataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yamliku lakum ḍarran walā nafʿan wal-lahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
qul yāahla al-kitābi lā taghlū fī dīnikum ghayra al-ḥaqi walā tattabiʿū ahwāa qawmin qad ḍallū min qablu wa-aḍallū kathīran waḍallū ʿan sawāi al-sabīli
luʿina alladhīna kafarū min banī is'rāīla ʿalā lisāni dāwūda waʿīsā ib'ni maryama dhālika bimā ʿaṣaw wakānū yaʿtadūna
kānū lā yatanāhawna ʿan munkarin faʿalūhu labi'sa mā kānū yafʿalūna
tarā kathīran min'hum yatawallawna alladhīna kafarū labi'sa mā qaddamat lahum anfusuhum an sakhiṭa al-lahu ʿalayhim wafī al-ʿadhābi hum khālidūna
walaw kānū yu'minūna bil-lahi wal-nabiyi wamā unzila ilayhi mā ittakhadhūhum awliyāa walākinna kathīran min'hum fāsiqūna

latajidanna ashadda al-nāsi ʿadāwatan lilladhīna āmanū al-yahūda wa-alladhīna ashrakū walatajidanna aqrabahum mawaddatan lilladhīna āmanū alladhīna qālū innā naṣārā dhālika bi-anna min'hum qissīsīna waruh'bānan wa-annahum lā yastakbirūna
wa-idhā samiʿū mā unzila ilā al-rasūli tarā aʿyunahum tafīḍu mina al-damʿi mimmā ʿarafū mina al-ḥaqi yaqūlūna rabbanā āmannā fa-uk'tub'nā maʿa al-shāhidīna
wamā lanā lā nu'minu bil-lahi wamā jāanā mina al-ḥaqi wanaṭmaʿu an yud'khilanā rabbunā maʿa al-qawmi al-ṣāliḥīna
fa-athābahumu al-lahu bimā qālū jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wadhālika jazāu al-muḥ'sinīna
wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tuḥarrimū ṭayyibāti mā aḥalla al-lahu lakum walā taʿtadū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
wakulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha alladhī antum bihi mu'minūna

lā yuākhidhukumu al-lahu bil-laghwi fī aymānikum walākin yuākhidhukum bimā ʿaqqadttumu al-aymāna fakaffāratuhu iṭ'ʿāmu ʿasharati masākīna min awsaṭi mā tuṭ'ʿimūna ahlīkum aw kis'watuhum aw taḥrīru raqabatin faman lam yajid faṣiyāmu thalāthati ayyāmin dhālika kaffāratu aymānikum idhā ḥalaftum wa-iḥ'faẓū aymānakum kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum āyātihi laʿallakum tashkurūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū innamā al-khamru wal-maysiru wal-anṣābu wal-azlāmu rij'sun min ʿamali al-shayṭāni fa-ij'tanibūhu laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
innamā yurīdu al-shayṭānu an yūqiʿa baynakumu al-ʿadāwata wal-baghḍāa fī al-khamri wal-maysiri wayaṣuddakum ʿan dhik'ri al-lahi waʿani al-ṣalati fahal antum muntahūna
wa-aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla wa-iḥ'dharū fa-in tawallaytum fa-iʿ'lamū annamā ʿalā rasūlinā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
laysa ʿalā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti junāḥun fīmā ṭaʿimū idhā mā ittaqaw waāmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti thumma ittaqaw waāmanū thumma ittaqaw wa-aḥsanū wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū layabluwannakumu al-lahu bishayin mina al-ṣaydi tanāluhu aydīkum warimāḥukum liyaʿlama al-lahu man yakhāfuhu bil-ghaybi famani iʿ'tadā baʿda dhālika falahu ʿadhābun alīmun

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā taqtulū al-ṣayda wa-antum ḥurumun waman qatalahu minkum mutaʿammidan fajazāon mith'lu mā qatala mina al-naʿami yaḥkumu bihi dhawā ʿadlin minkum hadyan bāligha al-kaʿbati aw kaffāratun ṭaʿāmu masākīna aw ʿadlu dhālika ṣiyāman liyadhūqa wabāla amrihi ʿafā al-lahu ʿammā salafa waman ʿāda fayantaqimu al-lahu min'hu wal-lahu ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
uḥilla lakum ṣaydu al-baḥri waṭaʿāmuhu matāʿan lakum walilssayyārati waḥurrima ʿalaykum ṣaydu al-bari mā dum'tum ḥuruman wa-ittaqū al-laha alladhī ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna

jaʿala al-lahu al-kaʿbata al-bayta al-ḥarāma qiyāman lilnnāsi wal-shahra al-ḥarāma wal-hadya wal-qalāida dhālika litaʿlamū anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-anna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
iʿ'lamū anna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi wa-anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
mā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tub'dūna wamā taktumūna
qul lā yastawī al-khabīthu wal-ṭayibu walaw aʿjabaka kathratu al-khabīthi fa-ittaqū al-laha yāulī al-albābi laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tasalū ʿan ashyāa in tub'da lakum tasu'kum wa-in tasalū ʿanhā ḥīna yunazzalu al-qur'ānu tub'da lakum ʿafā al-lahu ʿanhā wal-lahu ghafūrun ḥalīmun
qad sa-alahā qawmun min qablikum thumma aṣbaḥū bihā kāfirīna
mā jaʿala al-lahu min baḥīratin walā sāibatin walā waṣīlatin walā ḥāmin walākinna alladhīna kafarū yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wa-aktharuhum lā yaʿqilūna
wa-idhā qīla lahum taʿālaw ilā mā anzala al-lahu wa-ilā al-rasūli qālū ḥasbunā mā wajadnā ʿalayhi ābāanā awalaw kāna ābāuhum lā yaʿlamūna shayan walā yahtadūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ʿalaykum anfusakum lā yaḍurrukum man ḍalla idhā ih'tadaytum ilā al-lahi marjiʿukum jamīʿan fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum taʿmalūna

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū shahādatu baynikum idhā ḥaḍara aḥadakumu al-mawtu ḥīna al-waṣiyati ith'nāni dhawā ʿadlin minkum aw ākharāni min ghayrikum in antum ḍarabtum fī al-arḍi fa-aṣābatkum muṣībatu al-mawti taḥbisūnahumā min baʿdi al-ṣalati fayuq'simāni bil-lahi ini ir'tabtum lā nashtarī bihi thamanan walaw kāna dhā qur'bā walā naktumu shahādata al-lahi innā idhan lamina al-āthimīna

fa-in ʿuthira ʿalā annahumā is'taḥaqqā ith'man faākharāni yaqūmāni maqāmahumā mina alladhīna is'taḥaqqa ʿalayhimu al-awlayāni fayuq'simāni bil-lahi lashahādatunā aḥaqqu min shahādatihimā wamā iʿ'tadaynā innā idhan lamina al-ẓālimīna
dhālika adnā an yatū bil-shahādati ʿalā wajhihā aw yakhāfū an turadda aymānun baʿda aymānihim wa-ittaqū al-laha wa-is'maʿū wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-fāsiqīna
yawma yajmaʿu al-lahu al-rusula fayaqūlu mādhā ujib'tum qālū lā ʿil'ma lanā innaka anta ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi

idh qāla al-lahu yāʿīsā ib'na maryama udh'kur niʿ'matī ʿalayka waʿalā wālidatika idh ayyadttuka birūḥi al-qudusi tukallimu al-nāsa fī al-mahdi wakahlan wa-idh ʿallamtuka al-kitāba wal-ḥik'mata wal-tawrāta wal-injīla wa-idh takhluqu mina al-ṭīni kahayati al-ṭayri bi-idh'nī fatanfukhu fīhā fatakūnu ṭayran bi-idh'nī watub'ri-u al-akmaha wal-abraṣa bi-idh'nī wa-idh tukh'riju al-mawtā bi-idh'nī wa-idh kafaftu banī is'rāīla ʿanka idh ji'tahum bil-bayināti faqāla alladhīna kafarū min'hum in hādhā illā siḥ'run mubīnun
wa-idh awḥaytu ilā al-ḥawāriyīna an āminū bī wabirasūlī qālū āmannā wa-ish'had bi-annanā mus'limūna
idh qāla al-ḥawāriyūna yāʿīsā ib'na maryama hal yastaṭīʿu rabbuka an yunazzila ʿalaynā māidatan mina al-samāi qāla ittaqū al-laha in kuntum mu'minīna
qālū nurīdu an nakula min'hā wataṭma-inna qulūbunā wanaʿlama an qad ṣadaqtanā wanakūna ʿalayhā mina al-shāhidīna
qāla ʿīsā ub'nu maryama al-lahuma rabbanā anzil ʿalaynā māidatan mina al-samāi takūnu lanā ʿīdan li-awwalinā waākhirinā waāyatan minka wa-ur'zuq'nā wa-anta khayru al-rāziqīna
qāla al-lahu innī munazziluhā ʿalaykum faman yakfur baʿdu minkum fa-innī uʿadhibuhu ʿadhāban lā uʿadhibuhu aḥadan mina al-ʿālamīna

wa-idh qāla al-lahu yāʿīsā ib'na maryama a-anta qul'ta lilnnāsi ittakhidhūnī wa-ummiya ilāhayni min dūni al-lahi qāla sub'ḥānaka mā yakūnu lī an aqūla mā laysa lī biḥaqqin in kuntu qul'tuhu faqad ʿalim'tahu taʿlamu mā fī nafsī walā aʿlamu mā fī nafsika innaka anta ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi

mā qul'tu lahum illā mā amartanī bihi ani uʿ'budū al-laha rabbī warabbakum wakuntu ʿalayhim shahīdan mā dum'tu fīhim falammā tawaffaytanī kunta anta al-raqība ʿalayhim wa-anta ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
in tuʿadhib'hum fa-innahum ʿibāduka wa-in taghfir lahum fa-innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
qāla al-lahu hādhā yawmu yanfaʿu al-ṣādiqīna ṣid'quhum lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadan raḍiya al-lahu ʿanhum waraḍū ʿanhu dhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
lillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā fīhinna wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
